name: EAB (evacuation aid blaster)
description:
Protect the evacuation of your people by pointing and shooting enemy ships.

If enemy ships destroy the core or shoot down the last evacuation ship it is game over.

Adding power to your blaster drains core shield.

Controls:Left Mouse ButtonShootRight Mouse ButtonAdd PowerSpacetoggle UI / Answer PhoneEscHold To Quit GameF5Quick Restart

Small project for "to be able to complete something."

This might be improved in the future.
